727080.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D The Tortle Package
727080.description:
Dungeons & Dragons: The Tortle Package

Tomb of Annihilation Supplement
The Snout of Omgar is a geographical region described briefly in Tomb of Annihilation.
Not much is revealed about the location or its inhabitants in that adventure, however. The Tortle Package is written for Dungeon Masters who want to know more about the Snout of Omgar.
This supplement also introduces a new playable character race, the tortle, and a new adventure location: Dangwaru, the Typhoon Palace. All of this is permissible for play within the D&D Adventurers League.
This product includes:
  • A new playable race, the Tortle. Which has been implemented in Fantasy Grounds to allow quick character creation.
  • 3 explorable Maps, in both keyed and unkeyed formats.
  • A sharable players module that allows access to the new playable race, the Tortle.
  • 2 new magic items.
  • 4 new creatures including: Geonid, Decapus, Topi, and Tortle
  • 6 new locations detailed with area descriptions, encounters, treasure, and traps
By Wizards RPG Team.
Requirements: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the built-in 5E Ruleset.
Recommended: D&D Dungeon Master's Guide, D&D Player's Handbook, and D&D Tomb of Annihilation
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
